timeline.bodyText: Just curious - if we are now not removing the listeners, shouldn't we try to avoid adding listener twice in case of a new onDeploy event?
timeline.author: afalhambra

replies.bodyText:
When Kjar is undeployed, the list of listeners is clear up. So when ondeploy is invoked againd, the list will be empty
Actually if we try to remove the listener on undeploy, we will get an exception because the deployment is already closed
